revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=MI424WR |revision=I |image1=Actiontec_MI424WR_rev_I.png |image1_size=250px |fcc_date=05/05/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router,FiOS modem |fcc_id=LNQMI424WRI |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6560 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB64M16DP-CF |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, CON1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1),, J7 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1545 |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=8-Kb I2C CMOS Serial EEPROM;Catalyst Semiconductor;24C08WI;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, MoCA 1.1 controller;Entropic Communications;EN2510-NG1;;2;,,, |flags=MoCA 1.1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08;Marvell version: 2.1.6_NQ |stock_os=Linux;2.6.16.14feroceon;OpenRG;, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=00:7F:28 |oui_eth=00:7F:28 }} :[https://www.actiontec.com/products/wifi-routers-gateways/fiber/bhr-rev-i/ Product page] This is a router used by Verizon for FiOS installations.
Single-core ARM based, ARM926EJ as recognized by the default Linux firmware
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=679927 On the DD-WRT forums] (internal shot and elaboration on specifications) :the device is presumably 88F6560 ('''AVANTA''' family) based
The device uses two '''Entropic Communications''' EN2510 for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections.
The default SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: '''2P6G2''').
